name: AAD: Find all Tenancy
AAD: Find all enabled Azure Users
AAD: List all enabled Azure User's Azure Group membership
AAD: Find all on-premise users owners of Azure Applications
AAD: Find all Azure Users owners of Azure Applications
AAD: Find all on-premise group owners of Azure Applications
AAD: Find all Azure Groups owners of Azure Applications
AAD: Find all on-premise users that have privileged access to Azure Tenancy
AAD: Find all on-premise groups that have privileged access to Azure Tenancy
AAD: Find all Azure Users that have privileged access to Azure Tenancy
AAD: Find all Azure Group that have privileged access to Azure Tenancy
AAD: Find all ServicePrincipals that have privileged access to Azure Tenancy
AAD: [NT] All On-Prem users with edges to Azure

queryList.query: MATCH  p=(m:User)-[r:AZResetPassword|AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator|AZContributor|AZAddMembers|AZGlobalAdmin|AZVMContributor|AZOwnsAZAvereContributor]->(n) WHERE m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5-21' RETURN p

name: AAD: Find all AzUser Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights
AAD: Find all On-Premise User Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights
AAD: Find all AzGroup Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights
AAD: Find all On-Premise Group Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights

AAD: Find all On-Premise User Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights to tenancy where AZUser has rights to on-premise Users that have dangerous rights to a on-pgroup

AAD: Find all On-Premise User Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights to tenancy where AZUser has rights to enabled on-premise Users with that have dangerous grmembership rights to highvalued groups

AAD: Find all On-Premise User Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights to tenancy where AZUser has rights to enabled on-premise Users with that have dangerous grmembership rights to highvalued groups with rights to domain

AAD: Find all On-Premise User Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights to tenancy where AZUser has rights to enabled on-premise Users with that have dangerous grmembership rights to highvalued groups with rights to domain including cross-domain routes

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u1:User)-[:AZOwns]->(azapp:AZApp)-[r1]->(azsp:AZServicePrincipal)-[r:AZGlobalAdmin|AZPrivilegedRoleAdmin*1..]->(azt:AZTenant)-[r3]->(azu:AZUser)-[r4]->(u2:User {enabled:true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g1:Group)-[r5:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(g2:Group {highvalue:true})-[r6]->(d1:Domain)-[r7]->(d2:Domain) WHnot d1 = d2 RETURN p

name: AAD: All Azure AD Groups that are synchronized with On-Premise AD

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' AND n.azsyncid IS NOT NULL RETURN n

name: AAD: [NT] Find all paths to an Azure VM
